person.persName: Andrew J. Mershon (Rockcastle and Madison County, Kentucky, painter and farmer.)

body.p: Rockcastle and Madison County, Kentucky, painter, soldier, and farmer. Garrard County, Kentucky, native. Married to Lucretia T. Wilson Mershon in Knox County, Kentucky, on November 29, 1853. Father of John A. Mershon, Ann E. Mershon, Norma E. Mershon, Ellen Mershon, and George Mershon. Painter in Montgomery County, Kentucky, in 1850. Painter in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, in 1860. Farmer in Madison County, Kentucky, in 1863.
